description_carte: Once a noble archer, Sagittarius now fires arrows of pure malice, inflicting eternal wounds.
description_visuelle: A centaur-like creature with a skeletal horse body and a humanoid torso wreathed in flames. Its bow is made of bone, and its arrows are tipped with dark energy.

skills.name: Burning Arrow
skills.description: Deals fire damage and applies a burning effect.

skills.name: Piercing Shot
skills.description: Deals physical damage and ignores a portion of the target's defense.

skills.name: Volley of Malice
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with multiple arrows.

skills.name: Eternal Wound
skills.description: Deals massive fire damage and reduces target's healing.
